title: Zombie Outbreak First Response
content: When the outbreak begins, secure your home immediately. Board up windows, fill containers with water, and gather non-perishable food. Remember: the first 72 hours are critical.

title: Urban Survival Shelter Guide
content: Abandoned buildings make dangerous shelters. Basements with steel doors or upper floors with collapsible staircases are better. Always maintain two escape routes.

title: Silent Weapons for Zombie Defense
content: Guns attract more zombies. Crossbows, suppressed pistols, and melee weapons are better options. Practice with them now before the outbreak occurs.
